ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors would like to thank Jerzy A. Pałka, Arkadiusz Surażyński and Ewa Petelska from the Department of Medicinal Chemistry, Medical University of Bialystok (UMB), for scientific consultations and help in freeze-drying the samples. The authors would like to thank their colleagues from the Department of Food Biotechnology for their support during the research. IMCh is a participant of “Studies, research, commercialization—a support program of UMB doctoral students” Sub-measure 8.2.1. Human Capital Operational Programme, co-financed from the European Union under the European Social Fund”.
